column4: If I wanted a BASH script to open several gui applications (at the same time) how could I do this?  If I just put each one in a bash script (one after the other) it will wait for one to close before opening the next one.
put an & at the end of each command that opens in a gui to load it in background
thanks I'll give that a try right now.
brilliant!  Worked like a charm!  Thanks for your help!
